Class DefaultUI

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.UI.DefaultUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndUI, InstructionsUI, MenuUI, PauseUI, UI
public abstract class DefaultUI extends Object
Abstract class representing the default UI component in the game.

    • drawCursorOptionsCentered

      public void drawCursorOptionsCentered(Graphics2D g2, String[] optionNames, int startingYTile)
      Draws a list of cursor-selectable options centered on the screen.
      Parameters:
      g2 - The graphics context used for rendering.
      optionNames - The array of option labels to be displayed.
      startingYTile - The Y tile position to begin drawing options from.
